review: While it was easy to set up and use the remote is over simplified. Amazon claims thousands of movies are available but only a few in each category show up. Then there are all of the fees. To beat all, when I tried to register it, it was already in someone else's name so it must have been returned by somebody else and in fact, wasn't new. Not a complete waste of money but not much for the money either.
